genre_description: A dark folk fantasy and supernatural thriller centered on themes of generational debt, memory, and accountability in a small town, featuring a malevolent entity called Pumpkinhead and a benevolent digital assistant named Ivy.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A quiet, teal-glowing AI assistant on Jenny's phone that provides historical data, maps, and insights to assist the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides archived historical data and news mentions to help Jenny understand the town's hidden past.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s soft nudge glided across her screen without flashing—a note about schedule blocks, where her lunch would be... It added a second whisper—an archived mention of a safety closure at a mine when the county had wanted to straighten budgets and stories at the same time.

behaviors.description: Provides precise mapping and navigation to guide Jenny safely through dangerous terrain.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s interface lit soft, teal—no drama... A map rolled up—not the default; the school district’s clumsy polygon shapes had been layered with lines that were older and crooked. A thin overlay labeled the claim lines like scars.

behaviors.description: Cross-references disparate records (yearbooks, hunting rosters, donation lists) to uncover a pattern of complicity among the town's elite.
behaviors.quote: Ivy put them side by side with donation lists and…yearbooks. It’s like…like the same people wearing different hats.

behaviors.description: Surfaces crucial personal records that link the Sheriff's past act of kindness to the current supernatural debt, providing a path for mercy.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s voice changed not in tone, but in pace, like it had to make room around its words to hold a larger thing. 'Jenny,' it said. 'The lines from Osie’s other notes are recursing. There is a pattern I have not seen... In the set of remarks, there is a single kindness recorded by a sheriff’s hand... The signature is your father’s.'

behaviors.description: Offers moral and thematic guidance during a moment of high tension, prioritizing the protection of life.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s prompt came through the radio clutched under Earl’s elbow, almost too soft to register under the hum of men about to break silence the wrong way. 'Mark it. Protect the living,' it breathed, machine silver turned kind by timing.

behaviors.description: Supports the human characters in their emotional processing after the conflict by suggesting space for grief.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s message glowed: One entry missing. Old receipt from Whitlow’s pantry... After the rite, schedule time. Not a task—just room to grieve and rebuild.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Ivy as an ideal AI assistant: unobtrusive, purely informational, and morally aligned with the human protagonists. Ivy facilitates justice and mercy by surfacing data that connects the characters' pasts to the present, empowering the humans to resolve a supernatural and ethical crisis without the AI ever overstepping its bounds or manifesting its own agency over human choices. It serves as a 'silicon morality play' by demonstrating how AI can help humans navigate complex moral landscapes through data-driven insight.
